attributes.action: Regulate the use of Postal Voting as there have been far too many cases of fraud
attributes.background: We the undersigned call for tougher controls on the mis-use of postal votes because there is no scrutiny with who fills in these votes and how are they to be judged genuine.

rejection.details:
It's clear that you are concerned about postal voting, but not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. You may be interested in signing an existing petition about postal voting:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/114551
